title.rendered: ‘Road Diary: Bruce Springsteen and The E Street Band’ Official Trailer

content.rendered:
“Road Diary: Bruce Springsteen and The E Street Band” offers the most in-depth look ever at the creation of the band’s legendary live performances, including footage of rehearsals, backstage moments, rare archival clips and personal reflections from Springsteen himself.

“Road Diary” premieres on Hulu and Disney+ on Oct. 25.

excerpt.rendered: “Road Diary: Bruce Springsteen and The E Street Band” offers the most in-depth look ever at the creation of the band’s legendary live performances, including footage of rehearsals, backstage moments, rare archival clips and personal reflections from Springsteen himself. “Road Diary” premieres on Hulu and Disney+ on Oct. 25.
